languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, наши астропаты получили с Даргонуса сообщение от Ахиллеаса Скаландра. Он внимательно изучил данные о вторжении на Веабос-6, включая упоминание ксеносских предводителей. Он обещал бросить все усилия своих помощников на выяснение личности этих врагов Человечества и их обнаружение".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, наши астропаты получили с Даргонуса сообщение от Ахиллеаса Скаландра. Он внимательно изучил данные о вторжении на Веабос-6, включая упоминание ксеносских предводителей. Он обещал бросить все усилия своих помощников на выяснение личности этих врагов Человечества и их обнаружение".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, наши астропаты получили с Даргонуса сообщение от Ахиллеаса Скаландра. Он внимательно изучил данные о вторжении на Веабос-6, включая упоминание ксеносских предводителей. Он обещал бросить все усилия своих помощников на выяснение личности этих врагов Человечества и их обнаружение".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, our astropaths received a message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander is reporting he closely studied the data from the incursion at Vheabos-6, including the mention of xeno leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Mankind so their location could be determined."

"Lord Captain, our astropaths received a message from Dargonus. Achilleas Scalander is reporting he closely studied the data from the incursion at Vheabos-6, including the mention of xeno leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Mankind so their location could be determined."

"Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos-VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

"Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos-VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

"Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们的星语者收到了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德从达戈努斯发来的信息。他仔细研究了关于维博斯六号星入侵的相关数据，分析了异形领袖的情报。他答应指导他的助手努力识别人类之敌，从而确定敌人的位置。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们的星语者收到了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德从达戈努斯发来的信息。他仔细研究了关于维博斯六号星入侵的相关数据，分析了异形领袖的情报。他答应指导他的助手努力识别人类之敌，从而确定敌人的位置。”

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, nuestros astrópatas han recibido un mensaje de Achilleas Scalander en Dargonus. Ha analizado con interés los datos de la incursión en Vheabos VI, incluyendo la mención de líderes xenos. Ha prometido dedicar los esfuerzos de sus ayudantes a identificar a esos enemigos de la Humanidad para poder determinar su ubicación».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, nuestros astrópatas han recibido un mensaje de Achilleas Scalander en Dargonus. Ha analizado con interés los datos de la incursión en Vheabos-VI, incluyendo la mención de líderes xenos. Ha prometido dedicar los esfuerzos de sus ayudantes a identificar a esos enemigos de la Humanidad para poder determinar su ubicación».

languages.text: "Lord Captain, unsere Astropathen haben eine Nachricht von Achilleas Scalander auf Dargonus erhalten. Er hat die Daten des Überfalls auf Vheabos VI genau studiert, einschließlich der Erwähnung der Anführer der Xenos. Er versprach, die Bemühungen seiner Helfer darauf zu richten, diese Feinde der Menschheit zu identifizieren, damit ihr Aufenthaltsort bestimmt werden kann."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos-VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nos astropathes ont reçu un message d'Achilleas Scalander, en provenance de Dargonus. Après avoir étudié attentivement les données de l'incursion sur Vhéabos-VI, en particulier celles concernant les chefs xénos, il a promis de concentrer les efforts de ses assistants sur l'identification de ces ennemis de l'humanité, afin qu'ils puissent être localisés. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, nos astropathes ont reçu un message d'Achilleas Scalander, en provenance de Dargonus. Après avoir étudié attentivement les données de l'incursion sur Vhéabos-VI, en particulier celles concernant les chefs xénos, il a promis de concentrer les efforts de ses assistants sur l'identification de ces ennemis de l'humanité, afin qu'ils puissent être localisés. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々の感応通信官がダルゴナスでアキレアス・スカランダーからメッセージを受け取りました。彼はヴィアボス・VIの襲撃からのデータをじっくり研究して、異種族のリーダーについても言及しています。彼は側近達を動かして人類の敵の素性を明らかにし、相手の位置を特定すると約束しました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、我々の感応通信官がダルゴナスでアキレアス・スカランダーからメッセージを受け取りました。彼はヴィアボス・VIの襲撃からのデータをじっくり研究して、異種族のリーダーについても言及しています。彼は側近達を動かして人類の敵の素性を明らかにし、相手の位置を特定すると約束しました」

languages.text: "Astropatlarımız, Dargonus'ta bulunan Achilleas Scalander'dan bir mesaj aldı Lord Kaptan. Vheabos VI'daki istilaya ve söz konusu zeno liderlerine dair veriler üzerinde detaylıca çalıştığını iletiyor. Bu çabalarında emir erlerini de kullanacağının ve İnsanlığın düşmanlarını tanımlayarak konumlarını belirleyeceğinin sözünü veriyor."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, our Astropaths received a message from Achilleas Scalander on Dargonus. He closely studied the data from the incursion on Vheabos VI, including the mention of the xenos leaders. He promised to direct the efforts of his aides to identify those enemies of Humanity so their location can be determined."
